column5: In Barrie Costco was the cheapest place by far to refill a propane bbq tank. I was told they don't have the refill facility any more.  What is my next cheapest option to refill a tank in Barrie???
I get mine done at the canadian tire gas station on Mapleview....probably not the cheapest ($18) but at least I can check out the tackle when I'm done. lol

Beware of independant operators/refill stations. It is not uncommon to short fill tanks. The indepenpant gas station on Queen St N/Mississauga Rd. in Streetsville (Mississauga) fill only to 12-14 lbs (I have weighed them) and totally rip off their customers. I 'spread the word' as often as I can.  Feel free to pass it on!  Slayer
To my knowledge, Costco is the cheapest around, but they will only refill the tanks that they sell in the store I believe.
$11.99 here at Costco but that might be a little far for most members.
Costco in Barrie doesn't sell propane anymore.
Absolutely wrong !!!!!!! Costco refills all propane tanks!!!! Here in the gta it is $14.11 including tax for a 20 LB.
